org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.processors.machineid.Util

  • public final class Util
extends Object
    A utility class providing methods to resolve the machine ID from:
    • an environment variable or
    • a hostname or
    • as a random ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getMachineId(boolean getfromEnv, String envVariableName, boolean getFromHostname)
      This method retrieves the machine ID as configured in a specific environment variable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getMachineId

        public static String getMachineId(boolean getfromEnv,
                                  String envVariableName,
                                  boolean getFromHostname)
                           throws AuditException
        This method retrieves the machine ID as configured in a specific environment variable.

        If the env variable is not configured or empty, the host ID defaults to "$HOSTNAME:$TIMESTAMP", where:

        • $HOSTNAME is the fully qualified hostname of localhost (see InetAddress.getLocalHost() and InetAddress.getCanonicalHostName())
        • $TIMESTAMP is the epoch timestamp

        If the hostname cannot be resolved from the environment or the hostname, then a ID is generated as the machine ID.

        Parameters:
        getfromEnv - True if the method should try reading the machine ID from the environment, false to skip
        envVariableName - The name of the environment variable to read the machine ID from
        getFromHostname - True if the method should try crafting the machine ID from the hostname, false to skip
        Returns:
        The machine ID as resolved by the algorithm described above
        Throws:
        AuditException - When the machineID cannot be determined
